price: Wa wundi utinya Allah Nyirimpuhwe atamubona, ndetse akaza afite umutima wicuza.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
